thig2.7:0.3_0: As a friend of the local statement:
thig2.7:1.1_0: “What you heard from the perfected ones is right.
thig2.7:2.1_0: and the eighth day of the fortnight,
thig2.7:2.2_0: as well as on the fortnightly special displays.
thig2.7:2.3_0: Today I eat just once a day,
thig2.7:2.4_0: my head is shaven, I wear the outer robe.
thig2.7:2.5_0: I don’t long for the host of gods,
thig2.7:2.6_0: for stress has been removed from my heart.
